description:
Unfortunately, work doesn’t get a rain delay. Dedicated cycle commuters know how important rain pants are. Designed in a city that locals often call “Rain-couver”, the Hydrocycle pants will stand up to your wettest commutes. The 2.5-layer waterproof breathable material was designed to keep you dry on those day where the road spray, is almost as bad as the rain. Lightweight design rolls up small, making them easy to stash in a pack or pannier when the rain stops – or on the west coast, when summer starts.

  • DWR (durable water repellency) finish provides excellent water repellency for improved performance and greater comfort
  • Taped seams mean even the heaviest downpour won’t creep in
  • Articulated knees for bunch-free pedalling
  • Wide elastic waistband and drawcord for that just right fit
  • Zippered cuffs mean you don’t need to take your shoes off to get in and out of your riding pants
  • Snap-down leg extension provides more coverage when needed
  • Reflective stripes on the lower leg increase visibility
  • Hook-and-loop straps on the cuff help you seal out rain and road spray
  • Locker loop means you can hang your pants and not just throw them over the locker door to dry
  • Regular fit feels just right and leaves room to layer
name: MEC Hydrocycle Pants - Women's
